languages.text: "Мы были союзниками. Она доверила мне изучать добытый ею трофей". {n}Голос вокса становится тихим и хриплым, будто доносится из далекого прошлого.{/n} "Мы, Амарнат, открыл базовые способы коммуникации с ним. Разработал для нее боевой штамм техночумы. Я был устрашен им. И разработал ответ — Эсхатос. Концепцию ультимативного прерывания машинной жизни".

"We were allies. She entrusted me with studying a trophy she had obtained." {n}The voice from the vox grows quiet and hoarse, as though coming from a distant past:{/n} "We, Amarnat, discovered the basic ways of communicating with it. We developed a weapons-grade strain of tech-blight for her. It terrified me. So I developed its antidote — Eschatos. The concept for the ultimate interruption of machine life."
languages.original_text: "Мы были союзниками. Она доверила мне изучать добытый ею трофей". {n}Голос вокса становится тихим и хриплым, будто доносится из далекого прошлого.{/n} "Мы, Амарнат, открыл базовые способы коммуникации с ним. Разработал для нее боевой штамм техночумы. Я был устрашен им. И разработал ответ — Эсхатос. Концепцию ультимативного прерывания машинной жизни".

She entrusted me with studying a trophy she had obtained." {n}The voice from the vox grows quiet and hoarse, as though coming from a distant past.{/n} "We, Amarnat, discovered the basic ways of communicating with it. We developed a weapons-grade strain of tech-blight for her. It terrified me. So I developed an answer to it. Eschatos. The concept for ultimate interruption of machine life."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「私たちは仲間だった。シオドーラが入手した、ある戦利品の研究を任せてもらっていた」{n}ヴォクスからの声が、遠い過去から聞こえてくるような、落ち着いたしゃがれ声になる。{/n}「私たちは、アマルナトは、その戦利品と対話する基本的な方法を発見した。彼女のため、兵器級の技術破壊株を開発した。それが私を脅かしたのだ。そこで対抗手段を開発した…つまりエスカトだ。機械生命を根本的に断つという構想で」
languages.original_text: "We were allies. She entrusted me with studying a trophy she had obtained." {n}The voice from the vox grows quiet and hoarse, as though coming from a distant past:{/n} "We, Amarnat, discovered the basic ways of communicating with it. We developed a weapons-grade strain of tech-blight for her. It terrified me. So I developed its antidote — Eschatos. The concept for the ultimate interruption of machine life."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは仲間だった。シオドーラが入手した、ある戦利品の研究を任せてもらっていた」{n}ヴォクスからの声が、遠い過去から聞こえてくるような、落ち着いたしゃがれ声になる。{/n}「私たちは、アマルナトは、その戦利品と対話する基本的な方法を発見した。彼女のため、兵器級の技術破壊株を開発した。それが私を脅かしたのだ。そこで対抗手段を開発した…つまりエスカトだ。機械生命を根本的に断つという構想で」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我们曾是盟友，她曾委托我研究她的某件战利品。”{n}音阵装置中发出了安静、沙哑的声音，仿佛来自遥远的过去。{/n}“我们，阿玛纳特，发现了与那件战利品交流的基本方法。我们为她研制了一种武器级别的病毒，名为‘技术枯萎症’。它的效果把我吓坏了，于是我研发了解药，也就是‘终焉审判’，象征着机械生命的终极结束。”
languages.original_text: "We were allies. She entrusted me with studying a trophy she had obtained." {n}The voice from the vox grows quiet and hoarse, as though coming from a distant past:{/n} "We, Amarnat, discovered the basic ways of communicating with it. We developed a weapons-grade strain of tech-blight for her. It terrified me. So I developed its antidote — Eschatos. The concept for the ultimate interruption of machine life."

traits.locale_text: “我们曾是盟友，她曾委托我研究她的某件战利品。”{n}音阵装置中发出了安静、沙哑的声音，仿佛来自遥远的过去。{/n}“我们，阿玛纳特，发现了与那件战利品交流的基本方法。我们为她研制了一种武器级别的病毒，名为‘技术枯萎症’。它的效果把我吓坏了，于是我研发了解药，也就是‘终焉审判’，象征着机械生命的终极结束。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Nous étions alliés. Elle m'avait confié l'étude d'un trophée qu'elle avait trouvé. » {n}La voix provenant du vox se fait plus discrète, plus rauque, comme si elle venait d'un lointain passé.{/n} « Nous, Amarnat, avons découvert un moyen de communiquer avec, puis nous avons développé la souche d'un technovirus qu'elle pourrait utiliser à des fins militaires. Cela me terrifiait. Alors, j'ai développé un antidote : Eschatos. Le moyen de mettre un terme à la vie des machines. »
languages.original_text: "We were allies. She entrusted me with studying a trophy she had obtained." {n}The voice from the vox grows quiet and hoarse, as though coming from a distant past:{/n} "We, Amarnat, discovered the basic ways of communicating with it. We developed a weapons-grade strain of tech-blight for her. It terrified me. So I developed its antidote — Eschatos. The concept for the ultimate interruption of machine life."

traits.locale_text: « Nous étions alliés. Elle m'avait confié l'étude d'un trophée qu'elle avait trouvé. » {n}La voix provenant du vox se fait plus discrète, plus rauque, comme si elle venait d'un lointain passé.{/n} « Nous, Amarnat, avons découvert un moyen de communiquer avec, puis nous avons développé la souche d'un technovirus qu'elle pourrait utiliser à des fins militaires. Cela me terrifiait. Alors, j'ai développé un antidote : Eschatos. Le moyen de mettre un terme à la vie des machines. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Éramos aliados. Me confió el estudio de un trofeo que había conseguido». {n}La voz proveniente del voco suena cada vez más tranquila y ronca, como si proviniese de un pasado lejano.{/n} «Nosotros, Amarnat, descubrimos una forma sencilla de comunicarnos con él. Desarrollamos una cepa de tecnoplaga armamentística para ella. A mí me aterrorizaba, por eso desarrollé a Eschatos, su antídoto. El concepto de la interrupción definitiva de la vida de una máquina».
languages.original_text: "We were allies. She entrusted me with studying a trophy she had obtained." {n}The voice from the vox grows quiet and hoarse, as though coming from a distant past:{/n} "We, Amarnat, discovered the basic ways of communicating with it. We developed a weapons-grade strain of tech-blight for her. It terrified me. So I developed its antidote — Eschatos. The concept for the ultimate interruption of machine life."

traits.locale_text: «Éramos aliados. Me confió el estudio de un trofeo que había conseguido». {n}La voz proveniente del voco suena cada vez más tranquila y ronca, como si proviniese de un pasado lejano.{/n} «Nosotros, Amarnat, descubrimos una forma sencilla de comunicarnos con él. Desarrollamos una cepa de tecnoplaga armamentística para ella. A mí me aterrorizaba, por eso desarrollé a Eschatos, su antídoto. El concepto de la interrupción definitiva de la vida de una máquina».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Wir waren Verbündete. Sie hat mich das Studium einer Trophäe anvertraut, die sie errungen hatte." {n}Die Stimme aus dem Vox wird still und heiser, als würde sie aus einer fernen Vergangenheit kommen.{/n} "Wir, Amarnat, haben die grundlegenden Wege entdeckt, wie man damit kommunizieren kann. Wir haben für sie einen waffenfähigen Stamm der Tech-Seuche erschaffen. Er hat mir schreckliche Angst gemacht. Also habe ich ein Gegengift entwickelt — Eschatos. Das Konzept für die ultimative Unterbrechung des Maschinenlebens."
languages.original_text: "We were allies. She entrusted me with studying a trophy she had obtained." {n}The voice from the vox grows quiet and hoarse, as though coming from a distant past:{/n} "We, Amarnat, discovered the basic ways of communicating with it. We developed a weapons-grade strain of tech-blight for her. It terrified me. So I developed its antidote — Eschatos. The concept for the ultimate interruption of machine life."

traits.locale_text: "Wir waren Verbündete. Sie hat mich das Studium einer Trophäe anvertraut, die sie errungen hatte." {n}Die Stimme aus dem Vox wird still und heiser, als würde sie aus einer fernen Vergangenheit kommen.{/n} "Wir, Amarnat, haben die grundlegenden Wege entdeckt, wie man damit kommunizieren kann. Wir haben für sie einen waffenfähigen Stamm der Tech-Seuche erschaffen. Er hat mir schreckliche Angst gemacht. Also habe ich ein Gegengift entwickelt — Eschatos. Das Konzept für die ultimative Unterbrechung des Maschinenlebens."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Müttefiktik. Elde ettiği bir ganimeti, üzerinde çalışmam için bana emanet etmişti." {n}Vokstan gelen ses, uzak bir geçmişten gelirmişçesine kısılıp boğuklaşıyor.{/n} "Amarnat olarak biz, ganimetle iletişim kurmanın yolunu keşfettik. Theodora için silah kategorisinde bir tekno afet geliştirdik. Dehşete düştüm, bu yüzden de panzehiri olan Eskatos'u, makine yaşamının nihai kesintisinin tasarımını geliştirdim."
languages.original_text: "We were allies. She entrusted me with studying a trophy she had obtained." {n}The voice from the vox grows quiet and hoarse, as though coming from a distant past:{/n} "We, Amarnat, discovered the basic ways of communicating with it. We developed a weapons-grade strain of tech-blight for her. It terrified me. So I developed its antidote — Eschatos. The concept for the ultimate interruption of machine life."

traits.locale_text: "Müttefiktik. Elde ettiği bir ganimeti, üzerinde çalışmam için bana emanet etmişti." {n}Vokstan gelen ses, uzak bir geçmişten gelirmişçesine kısılıp boğuklaşıyor.{/n} "Biz, Amarnat, onunla temel iletişim kurma yöntemlerini keşfettik. Theodora için silah kategorisinde bir tekno afet geliştirdik. Beni dehşete düşürdü ve bu nedenle panzehirini geliştirdim: Eschatos. Makine yaşamının nihai kesintisinin tasarımı."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
